title: An incentive mechanism design for federated learning with multiple task publishers by contract theory approach
summaries: in the decentralized FL framework, propose __a rewarding mechanism in a multi-servers environment__ by saving all contracts from multi-servers to a 3rd-party blockchain and let each worker select
systemModel: task publishers [1] design contracts according to the quality of worker nodes [2] save the content of each contract in the blockchain<ol>
each worker signs a contract to maximize his profit
each worker trains model locally and save the update to the blockchain
the corresponding task publisher obtains the update on the blockchain and does a global aggregation
the task publisher pays the reward to the worker and save the record to the blockchain
